v6.controller

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • v6.controller.Element
      • v6.controller.Note

  • public class Note
extends Element
    For each element of Note a new Image of the note gets placed in the GUI. The properties of the Note then can help the program to detect the type of note

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class v6.controller.Element

    • Constructor Detail

      • Note

        public Note(int notenInTakt,
            int position,
            boolean positionUmsetzen,
            int vorzeichen,
            com.sun.javafx.geom.Point2D coordinatesOfNote)
        Constructor for the note element.
        Parameters:
        notenInTakt - describes the type of note - for viertelNote = 4 - for halbeNote = 2 - ...
        position - describes the vertical position - 23 possible positions = based on the position the tone of the note can be determined
        vorzeichen - Variable responsible for identification of vorzeichen.The function changeNote(boolean)} gets the vorzeichen from this variable and tells the program wich vorzeichen is chosen
